Author: stefanica
Text: I would bet good money that you burned more than that just existing for an hour. Those calorie burning charts can't be accurate for everyone, or even most. They're only good as a comparison tool, if that. Do an exercise because it makes you move, makes you happy, and is something that isn't likely to injure you. If you are doing it regularly, you will get fitter. And therefore burn more calories even at rest.
